siteMetadata.title: Proto Proto | Street inspired, fair, fashion jewellery
siteMetadata.description: We think design's got a problem. Basically, the people, countries, cultures with the money tell those without it what to do. If we want equality and diverse expression, it's all wrong. So we're changing that. We're prototyping new expressions and prototyping fairer ways to design and make things. We're Proto Proto.
